ComicInfo.Summary:
With Vlad in a coma, Cassie has to side with one of the two Crows to stop the other from getting revenge upon an entire city. But can the legendary killer of undead killers stomach working side by side with the one thing she hates the most?
*List of covers and their creators:* | Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | |-------|-----------------------------------------|-------------------------------------------|------------------| | Reg | Regular Cover | Tim Seeley (a) & Jim Terry (c) | 1 | | RI-A | 1:10 Retailer Incentive Variant Cover A | Rebekah Isaacs (a) & Tamra Bonvillain (c) | 2 | | RI-B | 1:20 Retailer Incentive Variant Cover B | Tim Seeley | 3-4 |
ComicInfo.Title: She Wears Shadows Part 2
